title: RP
body: Hey everyone I just bought a 'paysafecard' but it doesn't work. Any ideas?(I didn't give it to anyone, no one saw the code, and nah, I did not redeem it yet, b'cuz something is wrong)

replies.body: Hey, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look and find out what's going on.  We may be able to find some options, so we'll see you there!

You might want to look at [this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753064-paysafecard) and see if you are able to get it working. Double check that there are appropriate funds for the selected purchase. If you're still having issues, follow the guide in that article to send a support ticket.
